sections.title: Verse 1
content: As the deer panteth for the water,
So my soul longeth after Thee.
You alone are my heart's desire,
And I long to worship Thee.

sections.title: Chorus
content: You alone are my strength, my shield;
To You alone may my spirit yield.
You alone are my heart's desire,
And I long to worship Thee.

sections.title: Verse 2
content: You're my Friend and You are my Brother,
Even though You are a King.
I love You more than any other,

sections.title: Verse 3
content: I want You more than gold or silver,
You alone are the real joy giver
And the apple of my eye.
